pages.text: If left to their own devices, a Vagrant may create a Masticator to infest large swaths of terrain. While the weapon itself is fairly weak offensively, behaving more like a bubble machine than a flamethrower, it can spell trouble later if the Vagrant is not dealt with.

It is unknown how Vagrants obtain such a weapon, however. It does appear to resemble a Beckon.$(br2)$(#630000)I'm starting to notice a trend here.$(br2)This item is the result of giving a Stage I Beckon Moldered Segments, by the way.
The Masticator cannot function without fuel, however, in the form of Fetid 'Canisters'. These flesh mounds appear to be crafted from various high-ranking parasite tissues, most often that of Beckons.

Eventually, a Vagrant may upgrade their Masticator with a Stage IV Beckon into a much stronger variant upon the emergence of a Node. The Consecrator is capable of spreading the Parasite Biome and its related tissues, furthering parasite evolution more drastically than its predecessor.
$(#630000)The Consecrator can only be created in the Parasite Biome, via giving either an existing Masticator or Moldered Segments to a Stage IV Beckon.
